author: james3426
title: Interesting
review:
Technic used to have awesome themrs like cyber-slam/competition and Slizers/Throwbots that had way cooler functions than today's Technic sets. Looks like I am the first to review this. This is just the simplest function of the old Technic line. I found out that there are also functions like boxing vehicles. This function is still cool nonetheless. The vehicle can either be a helicopter or a plane, and I like the plane more (pictured here). The function where you shoot at the scorpions' tail and they flip is fun and amusing. The technic minifigure is rather pode-able.

Pros:
very play-able.
Function is fun.
Scorpions are detailed.
Interesting and easy build.
Rare colored pieces.

Cons:
None!

In all, a great classic technic set. I recommend this to any lego fan.

author: Stan
title: Hit the Spiders!
review:
This Technik Set is quite funny. You've got this Technik Guy (these guys are quite rare) sitting in a flying machine and there are also these 2 spiders you must hit. I love to see the Spiders bouncing around when you hit them with the foam bullet. Another thing that I enjoy at this set is that there are purple bricks. I can't remember a Technik Set with purple bricks (can you??).

Pros:
-technik guy
-spiders
-purple bricks
-foam bullet

Cons:
-none

Overall this is a great set and I recommend to buy it. It is definetly worth the money.
